mapper.insert: insert into mac_info (no, branch, lng, lat, dis, gu, dong) values (#{no}, #{branch}, #{lng}, #{lat}, #{dis}, #{gu}, #{dong})
insert into star_info (no, branch, lng, lat, dis, gu, dong) values (#{no}, #{branch}, #{lng}, #{lat}, #{dis}, #{gu}, #{dong})
insert into station_info (no, line, name, lat, lng, dis, gu, dong) values (#{no}, #{line}, #{name}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{dis}, #{gu}, #{dong})

insert into gugun_score (gugun, staravg, starmin, starmax, macavg, macmin, macmax, stavg, stmin, stmax) values (#{gugun}, #{staravg}, #{starmin}, #{starmax}, #{macavg}, #{macmin}, #{macmax}, #{stavg}, #{stmin}, #{stmax})

insert into dong_score (dongcode, dong, staravg, starmin, starmax, macavg, macmin, macmax, stavg, stmin, stmax) values (#{dongcode}, #{dong}, #{staravg}, #{starmin}, #{starmax}, #{macavg}, #{macmin}, #{macmax}, #{stavg}, #{stmin}, #{stmax})
